name: bootstrapdanilo
description: proyecto web empleando bootstrap, derechos no reservados

scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin pagina2.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pagina2.html && usemin pagina3.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pagina3.html && usemin pagina4.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pagina4.html
scripts.build: npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Danilo gomez Rios
